price: Haka dai azãbar* take, kuma lalle ne azãbar Lãhira ta fi girma, in da sun kasance zã su iya gãnẽwã.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: * Irin wannan azãba ce za a yi wa Ƙuraishãwa, dangin Annabi, kamar yadda aka yi wa mãsu gonar lambu, wãto da suka tũba aka musanya musu da abin da ya fi abin da suka sãba sãmu. Wato an gayã wa Annabi ne lõkacin da danginsa suka kangare, suka ƙi shiga Musulunci, aka yi musu azãbar fari, da rashin ruwa shekara bakwai, Allah Ya gaya masa cewa, zã su musulunta, alheri ya kõma musu. Ya kuwa kõma, kamar yadda Allah Ya yi alkawari

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
